name: Mutaling
description:
Welcome to Mutaling! A Game by LanceFryar and CarlosGabae

In this game you have to survive while killing creatures to absorb their genes. The enemies you kill the most will grant you their powers when your time to evolve arrives. You can be killed etiher by reaching zero in your life or by not gathering enough genes when your mutation arrives. Try to get a high score!

Controls:

Move: WASD

Jump/Fly: Space

Attack: Left mouse

Dash: Right mouse

We enourage the use of fullscreen.
